video_description:
PhoneArena reviews the ViewSonic ViewPad 7e. Known for being a prominent monitor manufacturer, we've already seen ViewSonic dabbling in the tablet market for the last year now with devices like the Android powered ViewPad 7 and ViewPad 10. Coming around for a second at bat with a 7" offering, they're hoping to reel in some people with their affordably priced ViewSonic ViewPad 7e model...
For more details, check out our web site: http://www.phonearena.com/reviews/ViewSonic-ViewPad-7e-Review_id2922
title: ViewSonic ViewPad 7e Review
